prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Lead, Drums, Piano, Guitar, Brass, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a Synth Lead, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Brass, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of a Synth Lead, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Brass, but Bass is absent.

Style 3:
This composition consists of a Synth Lead, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Brass, omitting Bass.
